name: Forlorn Junk Heap Has a Rich Private Life
name_original: Forlorn Junk Heap Has a Rich Private Life
description:
Entry for Theoryfest 2015. This game can be beaten in under a minute probably. The theory it's based on is the incredibly popular theory that Forlorn Junk Heap has a rich and fulfilling private life.

Music is "Leder's Gymnopedie" from the Mother 3 OST.
